title: BFYCHYC Bear Night Light for Kids, Graduation Gifts,BPA-Free ABS & Silicone Baby Nursery Bedside Lamp USB Rechargeable, Adjustable Brightness, Timer Setting
features: Baby-safe Light: -Baby-safe soft light, enough to produce a glow but nothing blinding or too bright for a nursery/children's room, fascinating companion for littles with a fear of the dark!

Cute and Squishy Design: -Made of premium BPA-free ABS & silicone material, safe for kids, easy to wipe off, and the soft touch is as fascinating as the lovely white bear, it is so funny and relaxing to squeeze the squishy body

Easy Control: -with a power switch underneath,the bedside night light can be set a preferred brightness out of 2 modes,dim for sleeping and bright for breastfeeding; Flipped the power switch to the brightness mode you like, then just tap the body to turn on/ off
Timer Setting: -with a timer switch underneath, the bear night light can be set 15min or 30min auto shut-off, will automatically turn off after you and your baby fall asleep
USB Rechargeable Night Light: -Built-in 1200mAh rechargeable battery enable the bear night light to be used for hours and can be recharged with the Type-C cable at any time
description: Clever design - lovely white bear image, will easily catch kids’ eyes, and literally calm them when they are upset. Top quality - premium toy-grade ABS and silica gel materials, non-toxic,odorless, safe for babies; What’s more, easy to wipe off when it gets dirty. A fascinating relaxing toy - the squishy body is super soft. It is so funny and relaxing to squeeze it when you are tired or anxious. Adorable gift idea for kids, friends and families, will make a fantastic birthday gift, Christmas gift, New Year gift, baby shower gift or bridal shower gift.
